data.question: Who you are & Your Focus
data.answer: Hello, my name is Akash Bharati. I'm a Full-Stack Developer with over 3 years of professional experience, specializing in building secure, scalable, and user-centric web applications. My core expertise lies in the .NET Core ecosystem for robust backend services and the React/Redux stack for dynamic frontends, with hands-on experience in deploying and managing solutions on AWS cloud.

data.question: The "What" and "So What"
data.answer:
In my current role at 3i Infotech, I've been deeply involved in developing and integrating enterprise-level systems. For instance, I led the integration of a Fusion ERP system with our .NET Core APIs, which automated real-time data sync for invoices and shipments. This directly reduced manual reconciliation efforts by 30%. I also architected the secure JWT authentication and Role-Based Access Control, ensuring the protection of sensitive customer data.

Beyond new features, I've taken ownership of system performance and reliability. By optimizing complex SQL queries, stored procedures, and functions, I was able to boost performance for high-volume transactions by 25%. Furthermore, I've resolved over 100 client-reported issues, which significantly improved system stability and client satisfaction.

data.question: Personal Project & Full-Stack Depth (Showing Initiative & Broader Skills)
data.answer: To further solidify my full-stack capabilities, I recently independently built 'QKart,' a complete e-commerce platform. This project allowed me to integrate technologies like Node.js, MongoDB, and modern frontend practices. I implemented features like a recommendation system and integrated Stripe and PayPal, which improved checkout conversion. I also containerized and deployed the entire application on AWS, giving me practical, end-to-end experience in cloud deployment and DevOps principles.
